name: @iota-pico/pow-wasm
description: IOTA Pico Framework Proof Of Work WebAssembly
author: martyn@iota.eco

scripts.docs-generate: typedoc --module commonjs --excludePrivate --theme markdown --readme none --hideGenerator --mode file --target es5 --exclude ./**/src/index.ts --out ./docs ./src
scripts.wasm-build: cd src-c && emcc -s USE_PTHREADS=0 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s WASM=1 -s SINGLE_FILE=1 -s "EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=['_ccurl_pow']" -s "EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['ccall', 'cwrap']" ccurl.c curl.c pearl_diver.c util/converter.c -o ../wasm/iota-pico-pow-wasm.js
scripts.wasm-docker: cd src-c && docker exec -it emscripten emcc -s USE_PTHREADS=0 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s WASM=1 -s SINGLE_FILE=1 -s "EXPORTED_FUNCTIONS=['_ccurl_pow']" -s "EXTRA_EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['ccall', 'cwrap']" ccurl.c curl.c pearl_diver.c util/converter.c -o ../wasm/iota-pico-pow-wasm.js
